select count(*) from scrap where sales_number=#{sales_number}

mapper.insert: insert into sales (sales_number, member_id, sales_date, sales_title, sales_content, sales_category_type, sales_category_rent, sales_deposit, sales_cost, sales_area, sales_address, sales_option, sales_build_year, sales_floor) values (seq_sales_number.nextval, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{sales_title}, #{sales_content}, #{sales_category_type}, #{sales_category_rent}, #{sales_deposit}, #{sales_cost}, #{sales_area}, #{sales_address}, #{sales_option}, #{sales_build_year}, #{sales_floor} )
